TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SourceExpressionException extends System.Exception implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

Docs.summary: Represents the exception that is thrown when a text-based expression cannot be converted into an executable form.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection errors) cil managed

Docs.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
A collection of compiler error data.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a collection of compiler errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The data associated with each error in the collection can include the file that contains the error, an error identification number, a message that describes the error, and other types of error information.

The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

Gets an enumerable type collection of compiler errors.
Docs.value: An enumerable collection of compiler errors.
